climbs.name: ZZ_Test Route- entering photos into Descriptions, etc

content.description:
Description Test Route for playing Inserting a photo Inserts a LINK to the photo via its ULR, not the photo itselftest photo insertTo insert the photo itself...try#1 - COPY the photo in your computer then CTRL V (paste) Nope...."nada"try#2 inserting the ULR without using the "insert link" (photo of Cannon in winter)https://www.mountainproject.com/photo/121141874link inserts...and that's all, not the photo itselftry#3 Use "insert link" but not "text" https://www.mountainproject.com/photo/121141874try#4 photo

Cannon in Winter

And that’s how it’s done!    In EDIT, Type photo enclosed in double “straight”  [   brackets followed immediately with the photo’s ident # …..if you EDIT this you’ll see the format for the inserted photo above
